attacks.name: Call for Friend
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, you may search your deck for a Basic Pokémon card with Brock in its name and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward. (You can't use this attack if your Bench is full.)

attacks.name: Hook Shot
attacks.effect: Don't apply Resistance for this attack. (Any other effects that would happen after applying Resistance still happen.)
